experience.title: Investments Team
experience.description: Convivialité Ventures is the Venture Capital arm of Pernod Ricard. We invest in consumer startups “in the convivialité space” that are reinventing the way people socialize, entertain, and share experiences together. Feel free to reach out if you're building for Experiences, Live Events, Travel, Fashion, F&B or any other Consumer/Consumer-Tech space.

projects: [{"title":"Online Portfolio Selection using Contextual Thompson Sampling","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"1) The project’s goal was to leverage the strength of Machine Learning to improve Multi-Armed Bandit Algorithm, Thompson Sampling for portfolio selection.2) Using Lightgbm, predicted states were used for the beta distribution estimation of Thompson Sampling3) The algorithm outperformed vanilla Thompson and also beat the market for Out-of-Sample data"},{},{"title":"WSH x Samhita","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020"}]

honors_and_awards.title: Business Model Canvas Competition
honors_and_awards.publication: Center for Technical Education - BITS Pilani Goa
honors_and_awards.description: BMCC was a part of the Tech Weekend held from 5-7 April'19 which was conducted by the Center for Technical Education, BITS Goa. Participation was done in groups of 3. The teams were first given a basic idea about what a business model was and within the next 30 minutes, every team had to strategically come up with a business model canvas for a company and thereby present it before a judge. The judge was an incoming Masters in Finance candidate at HEC Paris. We stood as the first… Show more
